front.name: Form 1: Shii-Cho
front.prevTxt: Master the basics and build your path to greatness

back.overview: Learn the foundational techniques of lightsaber combat. This is where all aspiring students begin their journey.

front.name: Form 2: Makashi
front.prevTxt: Elegance, precision, and victory in every duel

back.overview: A refined form focused on elegance and precision, ideal for one-on-one dueling.

front.name: Form 3: Soresu
front.prevTxt: Become an impenetrable force of defense

back.overview: Master the art of defense with Soresu, the ultimate form for countering aggressive attacks.

front.name: Form 4: Ataru
front.prevTxt: Speed, agility, and high-flying combat moves await

back.overview: A fast, acrobatic form designed for mobility and dynamic strikes.

front.name: Form 5: Djem So
front.prevTxt: Overpower your opponents with relentless strength

back.overview: Focus on raw power, strength, and aggressive defense, perfect for overwhelming opponents.
skills: Using your opponent's energy against them

front.name: Form 6: Niman
front.prevTxt: The balanced form—where versatility meets control

back.overview: A balanced form that blends the techniques of all forms, offering versatility in combat.
skills: A mix of defensive and offensive moves
How to die at the Battle of Geonosis

front.name: Form 7: Vaapad
front.prevTxt: Unleash your full potential with the most intense form of all

back.overview: A highly aggressive and fast-paced form, requiring intense focus and control of emotions.
skills: Balancing on the edge of Light and Dark
How to talk like Samuel L. Jackson

front.name: Form 7: Juyo (Sith)
front.prevTxt: Chaos and rage in its purest, most destructive form

back.overview: The Sith variant of Form 7, characterized by chaotic, aggressive movements driven by raw emotion.
skills: How to scream during combat properly

back.overview: The rare and controversial form that uses deception and tactical deactivation of the lightsaber.
skills: Illegal lightsaber techniques to outsmart enemies

front.name: Spins and Flourishes
front.prevTxt: Add flair to your fighting style—look good while winning!

back.overview: Add style to your combat with advanced spins and flourishes, increasing fluidity and intimidation.

front.name: History and Lore
front.prevTxt: The story behind the blade—discover the legends of lightsabers

back.overview: Dive into the rich history of lightsabers, exploring their origins and cultural significance.

front.name: Lightsaber Technology
front.prevTxt: Build, customize, and understand the weapon of the Jedi

back.overview: Understand the inner workings of lightsabers, from kyber crystals to advanced customization.

front.name: Double-Bladed Technique
front.prevTxt: Double the blade, double the danger

back.overview: Learn to wield the double-bladed saber, mastering offense and defense in a single weapon.

front.name: Reverse Grip Technique
front.prevTxt: Fight from the shadows with swift, unexpected strikes

back.overview: A specialized style focused on wielding the lightsaber in reverse grip for unexpected attacks.

front.name: Jar-Kai Technique
front.prevTxt: Why have one saber when you can have two?

back.overview: Master the art of wielding two lightsabers simultaneously for increased versatility and power.

front.name: Blaster Defense (Shein)
front.prevTxt: Reflect nerf gun fire with precision and style

back.overview: Learn to deflect blaster fire with precision and protect yourself from ranged attacks.

front.name: Stances
front.prevTxt: Find your footing—master the foundations of every battle

back.overview: The foundation of all lightsaber combat, focusing on proper posture and looking cool.
skills: How to prepare for different combat situations
How to pose for the camera

front.name: The Art of Duels
front.prevTxt: Study the greatest duels of Star Wars History

back.overview: Analyze iconic lightsaber duels from the movies to gain insight into advanced techniques and tactics.
skills: How to apply cinematic techniques to real-life dueling
